H0.text: In ‘Follow That Camel’, the fourteenth Carry On film, Sid James was replaced by which US actor. Bob Hope

H1.text: In ‘Follow That Camel’, the fourteenth Carry On film, Sid James was replaced by which US actor. Jerry Lewis

H2.text: In ‘Follow That Camel’, the fourteenth Carry On film, Sid James was replaced by which US actor. Milton Berle

H3.text: In ‘Follow That Camel’, the fourteenth Carry On film, Sid James was replaced by which US actor. Phil Silvers

A4.text: James was replaced in Follow That Camel by the American comic actor Phil Silvers.
